elements.name: Buying an espresso decreases Money and increases Health and Espressos

steps.name: I am at the location "in the Cloud Forest Cafe"
the value of my "Health" is 50
the value of my "Money" is 10
the value of my "Espressos" is 0
the value of my "bag" is "nothing cool"
I click the "Buy an espresso" button
the value of my "Money" should be 5
the value of my "Health" should be 60
the value of my "Espressos" should be 1
the value of my "bag" should be "nothing cool"

elements.name: Player cannot buy an espresso if they have no money

steps.name: I am at the location "in the Cloud Forest Cafe"
I bought 2 espressos
the value of my "Money" is 0
the value of my "Espressos" should be 2
I should not see the "Buy an espresso" button

elements.name: Player loses the game when health reaches 0

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
I play until the game ends when "Health" reaches 0
the value of my "Health" is 0
the game should end with the message "You health has deteriorated too much – you feel almost dead."
I should see the button "Play again"

elements.name: Player wins the game when espressos reach 5

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
I click the "Go north" button
I click the "Go east" button
I wait until the event "a can of beer for free" occurs
I click the "Go west" button
I click the "Go south" button
I click the "Go south" button
I click the "Go west" button
I wait until the event "jam with us?" occurs
I click the "Jam with the band" button
I click the "Go east" button
I click the "Go north" button
I click the "Enter the cafe" button
I wait until the event "The barista is in a dark corner" occurs
I click the "Give beer to barista" button
I bought 3 espressos
the value of my "Espressos" should be 5
the game should end with the message "Yes! You feel alive and pumping. Full of caffeine! You feel like... like... Luke Skywalker!"
I should see the button "Play again"

I should see the text includes the "The barista is in a dark corner phoning a friend. You overhear parts of the conversion:"
I should see the button ""
